      • encodeClientBehaviors

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder encodeClientBehaviors(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context,
                                            javax.faces.component.behavior.ClientBehaviorHolder component,
                                            java.lang.String eventDef)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Non-obstrusive way to apply client behaviors. Brought over from implementation of ace components for ace ajax. will be replaced in 1.4 Beta to reflect support for both mobi:transition and mobi:ajax behaviors Behaviors are rendered as options to the client side widget and applied by widget to necessary dom element
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getComponentResourceBundle

        public java.util.ResourceBundle getComponentResourceBundle(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context,
                                                  java.lang.String ACE_MESSAGES_BUNDLE)
        Not all text for components are easy to make attributes for components, especially those for accessibility. Default values are made available within the ace jar messages properties files. Users may override the key if they prefer their own, or their locale is not available.
        Returns:
        reference to resource bundle to get localised text for rendering

      • getLocalisedMessageFromBundle

        public static java.lang.String getLocalisedMessageFromBundle(java.util.ResourceBundle bundle,

                                             java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        localized or internationalized String value from message bundle
